Items.Name: DISNEY'S LION KING: PRIDE ROCK ON BROADWAY
Items.Description: if (navigator.appName == 'Microsoft Internet Explorer') { if (navigator.appVersion.substring(0,1) "); } else { document.write(" "); document.write(" "); document.write(" "); document.write(" BODY { background: url(http://niwun.pair.com/grecat/Carousel3a.jpg) }"); document.write(" "); document.write(" "); } } else { //Default to Netscape settings. document.write(" "); } DISNEY'S LION KING: PRIDE ROCK ON BROADWAY OFFERED FOR SALE FROM GRECAT MARKETING "TREASURES OF THE KINGDOM" Offered for sale is a copy of the book The Lion King: Pride Rock On Broadway . Written by Julie Taymor with Alexis Greene and published by Hyperion in October 1997. This book is new, not used. 192 pages, FIRST EDITION, hardback with dust jacket. Excellent condition with only slight rubbing and surface wear to the dust jacket from shipping and storage. 10 x 11 inches. Winner of six Tony Awards including Best Musical & Best Director. The Broadway adaptation of the remarkably successful film The Lion King is a stunning musical directed by Tony Award-nominated director Julie Taymor. In The Lion King: Pride Rock on Broadway, Taymor takes readers on a revealing journey. From the earliest sketches of costume concepts and set design to the trials and tribulations of mounting one of the most complex Broadway musicals in history, this lavishly illustrated volume allows readers an intimate perspective on the long road to opening night. Known for her singular style as a director and designer of striking costumes, masks, and puppets, Taymor's vision for The Lion King emphasizes the duality of human and animal. Remarkably detailed fabrics, carved masks, and extraordinary makeup bring the characters vibrantly to life. Exquisite sets depict the African savanna, an elephant graveyard, and Pride Rock. Taymor and her co-designer, Michael Curry, showcase the mechanics of the production, its stylized imagery, and distinctive puppetry. As the audience experiences the many scenes - gazelles leaping across the stage, thousands of wildebeest stampeding through the canyon, Timon hanging precariously above a waterfall - they become a part of the magic of theater. Buyer pays all shipping and optional insurance. USPS media mail shipping/handling is $4.50 within the US. Priority mail, international shipping and optional insurance are more. This measures 11" wide x 16" high having tiny pin holes at the corners and a small corner piece on the bottom right hand side measuring 3/8" x 3/8" on the diagonal absent. This was for a Saturday evening performance with ticket prices being $2.00, $1.50 and $1.00 to be held at the Emory Auditorium under management of Coit-Alber Bureaus in Cleveland Ohio. This has never been cleaned or had restoration work. The aging condition speaks of the character quality of the circa 1924 image that is an absolutely unique piece worthy of being called a museum treasure, no where else will you ever see this again. Items.Name: 8 OLD LIQUOR MINIS-Various Scotch Brands,'50s
Items.Description: 8 OLD LIQUOR MINIS-Various Scotch Brands,'50s Here are 8 old liquor miniatures (minis). These are part of the collection accumulated by my grandfather in the 1950's (maybe some in the late 40's). These are sold as collectibles only, not for human consumption. All but one are all still sealed, although all have evaporated to a large degree; they have wax on the tops, over the tax labels, perhaps applied at a later date to prevent further evaporation. These do show their age... but that's part of their charm! Sold as is. This lot includes: Peter Dawson - Special Blended Scotch Whiskey Grant's Best Procurable Blended Scotch Whiskey Johnnie Walker - Red Label (reverse has 1&1/2_ Florida Liquor Excise Tax stamp/sticker) Johnnie Walker - Black Label Martin's - Original V.V.O.Special Liqueur Blended Scotch Whiskey Ballantine - Liqueur Blended Scotch Whiskey (Fla. Items.Description: MESA STAR quilt -- Beautiful Scalloped Border no shams from the American Folk Art Collection _ "Close-up" view of detail BELOW... _ _ King_ Size " Mesa Star Quilt " _ This quilt is from an original "American Folk Art Collection" pattern._ The American Folk Art Collection consists of only 200 quilts.__ This is a quilt of distinction!!_ The quilt top is pieced of a durable cotton and ramie blend, the backing is 100% cotton and_has double polyester fill the backing is cream._ The colors are shades of green, magenta, rose and cream ._ The beautiful border is scalloped on all four sides._ This piece is really beautiful!_ VERY SOFT & COMFY._ This quilt is an amazing work of art!!_ Handmade, a lot of hand stitching, machine pieced.... heirloom quality quilt._ This quilt's border sets it apart from just an average quilt!_ It is_ very fresh looking and a real show piece._ The hand work in this quilt is gorgeous._ New!!!_ This quilt will be a lovely addition to your bed._ The measurements are 100" X 90"._ This quilt should retail for $150 to $225. The "American Folk Art " quilts were designed during the 1700's and 1800's._ The design of the "Mesa Star" quilt was carefully planned by prairie women during sewing bees and usually given to a bride as a part of her trousseau._ This quilt is a reproduction of a quilt from the American Folk Art Collection._ _ This quilt is a true treasure!! Items.Name: LIVE! SPIKE & DRU BUFFY BASH CHGO 2001 VHS
Items.Description: LIVE! SPIKE & DRU BUFFY BASH CHGO 2001 VHS THE VIDEO: MY HUSBAND, DAUGHTER & I WENT TO SEE JAMES MARSTERS & JULIET LANDAU IN CHICAGO THIS PAST AUGUST 18TH. WE DECIDED TO RECORD THE EVENT SINCE MY DAUGHTER WAS DRESSING UP FOR THE COSTUME CONTEST. THE VIDEO IS ABOUT 40 MINUTES LONG & HAS JAMES WHEN WE FIRST GOT INTO THE ROOM AT THE HYATT, TALKING TO FANS, GETTING HIS PICTURE TAKEN & SMOOZIN' AT HIS BEST. ALSO JULIET LANDAU IS FEATURED DOING THE SAME. THEN THERE'S JAMES & JULIET BEFORE SIGNING THE AUTOGRAPHS TALKING TO EACH OTHER AND SOME OF THE PEOPLE WORKING THERE BRINGING THEM THE PENS, ETC. THEN THERE'S JAMES & JULIET SIGNING. THE MOST ENTERTAINING PART & LONGEST SECTION IS THE BUFFY COSTUME CONTEST WHERE ABOUT A DOZEN PEOPLE GOT UP ON STAGE AND TALKED TO THE HOSTS, SAID WHO THEY WERE SUPPOSE TO BE, AND WALKED THE WALK IN CHARACTER ACROSS THE STAGE! JAMES & JULIET (WHO WERE ON STAGE BEFOREHAND) WERE THE JUDGES. THE CONTESTANTS WERE REALLY INTO THE CHARACTER, ESPECIALLY ''THE MASTER'', AND THE AUDIENCE CRACKED UP. IT'S VERY HIGH ENERGY AND LOTS OF FUN TO WATCH. THERE'S ALSO SOME DANCIN' GOIN ON. IT'S A FUN VIDEO & PRETTY GOOD FOR US AMATEURS! THIS PARTY WAS HOSTED BY SCORE, TO CELEBRATE THE RELEASE OF THE NEW CCG BUFFY GAME THIS PAST OCTOBER. IT WAS A PART OF THE WIZARD WORLD CONVENTION.
